title: From order to Chaos
body: Hello, I had 2 daily missions, to play with Order icon and to play with Chaos icon...I thought that i can do both of them so I did a Order mission but then i reliased that i can choose only one way...But the problem is that i wanted Chaos, not Order...Can I change that? Thanks for any advices :)

replies.body:
Same problem :(

I read this on the FAQ:

>[{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QEXq3Jr3,comment-id=00120001,timestamp=2017-06-15T21:22:39.559+0000)
> 
You'll be given the opportunity **to  **switch sides each day.  Once you're locked in, you won't be able to swap until the next day without a pass.

but I don't really get it. Why do we need a pass to just switch?

_FAQ link:_ https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/QEXq3Jr3-chaos-or-order-the-vs-faq-to-guide-you-to-your-destiny
You don't need a pass to switch!  Just hang on until the next day, and a mission will open up that allows you to switch.  :D
No worries, you can switch sides on the next day.  You'll get a mission to select another side if you like, and proceed with the next set of missions!
